response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product offers unparalleled performance and value, making it an excellent investment for anyone seeking excellence. Considering its outstanding features and benefits, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. We believe this price reflects the true value and potential of the product, and we're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 15000}
